content:
From: Jens Doll <jd@cococo.de>
There is now an enhanced version of the source editor and navigator Elbe
available. It works for Isabelle files and now contains

  • a verb box for keywords
  • an XML structuring facility
  • Fortran, PL1 and JAVA document types

with several bugs removed. Please have a look at

http://cococo.de/Elbe

Regards,
Jens
